messages.message: Who is the owner of map_records? We have an issue (somewhere urgent) where we are splitting by page, but we still only get one file. Is there a way to do map records where it outputs multiple files, one for each page? cc @Pritam Roy
@Aaron Vontell we are doing some consolidation of map records into the reader step itself, can look into it!! @Yash Aggarwal
This is urgent in that we need something that will work on Openlaneâ€™s env tomorrow :joy: so was curious to see what the approach is for current map_records
if I am not wrong we always had this as part of the single file
it's only the record count changes
Got it - do we have existing use cases or Flows that can do this without map record?
I think we should be ok, I have another approach, but was just curious
Not really!! I can find out if any one from solution eng has done that
